articles.title: Here's why bitcoin is so volatile: trader

articles.content: As bitcoin (BTC-USD) holds above $40,000, investors are laser-focused on the price gyrations, attempting to divine the next big move. One former trader at the New York Stock Exchange is demonstrating… [+3528 chars]

articles.author: Liz Jassin, Nexstar Media Wire
articles.title: Elon Musk selling his 'last remaining house' in San Francisco
articles.description: SpaceX CEO Elon Musk took to Twitter in May to announce that he'd be selling almost "all physical possessions" and that he would own "no house."
articles.content:
SAN FRANCISCO (KRON) In May, SpaceX CEO Elon Musk announced on Twitter that he would be selling almost “all physical possessions” and that he would own “no house.” 
Since then, the Tesla founder has… [+1517 chars]
